name: Milwaukee Car Brain
description: Quantitative research to inform local officials about costs and issues of auto-dependence in Milwaukee

chapters.title: What is Car Brain?
chapters.notes: Literature review - Ian Walker's work and other researchers

chapters.title: The Personal Burden
chapters.notes: Individual costs of car ownership, time, stress

chapters.title: Supersizing the Fleet
chapters.notes: Trends in vehicle size over time

chapters.title: Cascading Consequences
chapters.notes: Parking, road wear, safety, insurance costs

chapters.title: The Mobility Tax
chapters.notes: What it means when everyone must own a car

generalNotes:
Focus areas:
- Costs to people, government, society
- Vehicle size impacts
- Universal car ownership implications
- Supporting elected officials in controversial decisions
